meanings.definition: Crossed in the form of an X
meanings.sent1: The decussated lines on the paper formed a perfect X shape.
meanings.sent2: The decussated roads in the city made navigation confusing.
meanings.sent3: The decussated pattern on the quilt looked like a giant hug from afar.
meanings.sent4: The decussated branches of the trees created a natural canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The decussated design on the floor was so intricate, it mesmerized visitors.

meanings.definition: Intersecting or crossing at an angle
meanings.sent1: The decussated beams of light shone through the window.
meanings.sent2: The decussated wires in the circuit were carefully connected.
meanings.sent3: The decussated shadows on the wall resembled a mysterious dance.
meanings.sent4: The decussated paths in the garden led to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The decussated lines on the map marked the boundaries clearly.

meanings.sent1: The decussated threads in the fabric gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The decussated vines climbed up the wall in a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The decussated stripes on the shirt made it look like a zebra.
meanings.sent4: The decussated lines of the fence created an interesting visual effect.
meanings.sent5: The decussated tiles on the floor made it look like a chessboard.
